Meta.title: GanExtendDisplay (Nightly Provisional Patch)
Meta.author: monk0
Meta.description:
Provisional patch of GanExtendDisplay for Elin nightly compatibility. Fixes DNA.WriteNote errors and gene tooltip display issues. Original mod by Gan@伪物 (https://github.com/qaz13e/GanExtendDisplay)
Show more information, display roles, display enchantments of items 显示更多信息,角色显示，道具附魔显示 より多くの情報を表示, キャラクター表示, 道具の附魔表示
